questions.q: What is the accuracy of the transcriptions?
questions.a: The accuracy of the transcriptions is >95%. Upon agreement, we can guarantee 100% accuracy, with the appropriate countermeasures.
Yes. OpenCouncil is hosted on secure infrastructure within the European Union.

questions.q: Can I try OpenCouncil for free?
questions.a: Of course. OpenCouncil offers a free trial, with no restrictions on duration or features.
OpenCouncil for municipalities costs €7,800 per year. This price includes unlimited meetings, transcriptions, speaker recognition, AI summaries, hosting, and support.

questions.q: Which municipalities do you work with?
questions.a: Currently, OpenCouncil is in a pilot phase with the Municipality of Athens.
